00010 SEM_ID ErrorBase::globalErrorMutex = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE);
00011 Error ErrorBase::globalError;
00015 ErrorBase::ErrorBase():
00016     status(0)

00026 Error& ErrorBase::GetError()
00027 {   return error;  }
00028 
00029 const Error& ErrorBase::GetError() const
00030 {   return error;  }

00035 void ErrorBase::ClearError()
00036 {   error.Clear();  }
00037 
00045 void ErrorBase::SetError(Error::Code code, const char* filename, UINT32 lineNumber) const
00046 {
00047     //  If there was an error
00048     if (code != 0) {
00049         //  Set the current error information for this object.
00050         error.Set(code, filename, lineNumber, this);
00051         // Update the global error if there is not one already set.
00052         CRITICAL_REGION(globalErrorMutex);
00053         if (globalError.GetCode() == 0) {
00054             globalError = error;
00055         }
00056         END_REGION
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00065 bool ErrorBase::StatusIsFatal() const {
00066     return error.GetCode() < 0;
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00073 Error& ErrorBase::GetGlobalError() {
00074     CRITICAL_REGION(globalErrorMutex);
00075     return globalError;
00076     END_REGION
00077 }
